hero.title: AI-Powered Operations to Prevent Downtime
hero.subtitle: NexusFlow uses predictive AI to alert you before machine failures, optimize production schedules, and eliminate bottlenecks. Boost your productivity and reduce operational costs.
features.title: A Smarter Way to Manage Production
features.subtitle: Unlock unparalleled efficiency with our suite of AI-driven tools designed for the modern manufacturing floor.
features.1.title: Predictive Maintenance
features.1.description: Our AI analyzes real-time sensor data to predict machine failures before they happen, turning unplanned downtime into scheduled maintenance.
features.2.title: Intelligent Scheduling
features.2.description: Optimize your entire production line. Our algorithms analyze dependencies and constraints to create the most efficient schedules.
features.3.title: Real-Time Quality Analysis
features.3.description: Detect quality defects as they occur. Get instant alerts and root cause analysis to maintain the highest product standards.
features.4.title: Bottleneck Detection
features.4.description: Visualize your workflow and instantly identify bottlenecks that are slowing down your production.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We've got answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.
faq.1.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.1.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing period.
faq.2.question: What happens after my 14-day free trial ends?
faq.2.answer: After your trial ends, you will be asked to choose a plan and enter your payment information to continue using the premium features. If you don't, your account will be moved to the Basic plan.
faq.3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.3.answer: We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express, processed securely through Stripe.
faq.4.question: Is my data secure?
faq.4.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and security protocols to ensure your data is safe and secure. Your operational data is isolated and accessible only by you.
